text: Il giustiziere di mezzogiorno (Italian for The Noonday Executioner) is a 1975 Italian comedy film written and directed by Mario Amendola. It is a parody of Death Wish. ==Plot== Abandoned by his wife and daughter, after suffering some injustices, the surveyor Franco Gabbiani decides to take revenge against dishonest policemen, politicians and bullies. == Cast == *Franco Franchi as Franco Gabbiani * Ombretta De Carlo as Agata *Aldo Puglisi as Fernando *Gigi Ballista as Director Filiberto Rossetti * Raf Luca as Balloria *Maria Antonietta Beluzzi as Mrs. Barzuacchi *Franco Diogene as Nardini *Vincenzo Crocitti as Trippa *Mario Pisu as Inspector *Tom Felleghy as Rakosky *Alberto Farnese as Mr. Lorenzi *Enzo Andronico as Padre di famiglia ==See also== * List of Italian films of 1975 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1975 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian sex comedy films Category:1970s crime comedy films Category:Films directed by Mario Amendola Category:1970s parody films Category:Italian crime comedy films Category:Italian films about revenge Category:1970s sex comedy films Category:Italian parody films Category:1975 comedy films
